author: Minyvonne Burke
title: Bus driver who posted video about coughing rider dies after contracting coronavirus
description: A bus driver in Detroit, Michigan, who died after contracting the coronavirus just weeks earlier had posted a video complaining about a passenger who refused to cover her mouth while coughing.
content:
A bus driver in Detroit who died after contracting the coronavirus just weeks earlier had posted a video complaining about a passenger who he said refused to cover her mouth while coughing.
Mayor Mike Duggan and the Amalgamated Transit Union confirmed the de… [+3132 chars]
